attributes.action: Ban the use of actual TV newscasters in fictional programmes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: BBC especially is following the unwise lead of the USA in using real newscasters in fictional programmes like 'Spooks'. This is VERY unwise and the 'news' statements could be mistaken for ACTUAL news ..and if these relate to politically sensitive material - particularly when seen outside the UK, they could unwittingly be used to generate for anti-western feelings, or worse! [I have asked BBC to stop this and they have refused saying it's not a problem]
